name: Trine

files.trine-installer: N/A:Select the .run installer downloaded from http://humblebundle.com

content:
exe: trine-launcher
files:
- trine-installer: N/A:Select the .run installer downloaded from http://humblebundle.com
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: trine-installer
    format: zip
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/trine-bin
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/trine-bin32
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/trine-bin64
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/trine-launcher
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/trine-launcher32
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/trine-launcher64
